text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate B
text_block_list.text:
KE～～! W-We're never gonna make it!! We still have 
costumes and promotional signs to finish～～…!!

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate A
text_block_list.text:
Well, there aren't a lot of people to help around this time…. 
It's not just the PalmHeli duo, lots of other girls are preparing 
for the Autumn series now.

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate B
text_block_list.text:
All the class and team projects are at the height of 
preparations themselves, so lots of girls went there too. 
Are we the only ones left to make the throne!?

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
Mmmh…. …Hey you guys, the throne looks good enough already! 
Get started working on stuff over there.

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate B
text_block_list.text:
Eh, you serious? It's a lot simpler than 
what we originally decided on though….

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
If the Queen that will sit on it said it's fine, then it's fine! 
I'm already bored looking at things here, so I'm going there!

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate B
text_block_list.text: Ahh wait wait! Ah but, if it's like this, I guess we can make it…?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
(And so, the days flew by like an arrow, until it was finally the 
day before All Hooves' day–)

text_block_list.name: Horsegirls
text_block_list.text: W-W-We're done～～～!!!

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate B
text_block_list.text:
We finished in time….!! 
Things were really looking grim for a bit though!!

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate A
text_block_list.text:
We just barely made it～. 
I'm looking forward to all our guests having fun tomorrow～.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
…Yup. You all deserve some praise, Demon Queen Windy-chan's army!! 
Now head on home and get ready for tomorrow!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
Doto is heading to a meeting, but make sure to pass this onto her as well. 
All the work here is done!

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate A
text_block_list.text: Sure, I'll tell her! See you tomorrow, Windy-chan!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
…Why are you still here? 
You should head on home too, Digital.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Eh! Y-Yeah, uhm, yes you did. 
…How do I, but you see… the Demon Queen Castle is….

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: …It's still incomplete, right?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
This unworthy Digitan, shall now remember! The things in 
Windy-chan-sama's design document that we read 
in the beginning were even more, even more–

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Even more even more even more - Dreamy! Devilish! 
Prankster's heart! I could feel that kind of 
energy overflowing from the pages!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
It was a book that detailed a plan with no regard for labor or 
budget. A super extra special book that was packed with extra 
options using special foil papers and edge marking on each page…!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: …What are you talking about?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: My sincerest apologies!? No, i-i-i-in any case!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Is this really all the work that needs to be done? Ah! 
If we ask for permission, we can stay the night! If I start now, even I…!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: It's fine already! There's no more work for you to do!!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: …For the rest… Windy-chan can handle the rest by herself.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Eh…? All by yourself!?!?!?

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
You're in the way! Hurry up and go home, Digital! 
Buzz off, deadweight! You'll just hold me back!!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
Honestly, both you and the rest of them are all completely useless. 
I can't let any of you work on this anymore!!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
That's why, the Demon Queen will do everything by herself now! 
…Hurry up and go home–!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Hiii…!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
–and that's what happened, so here I am now, 
having run away, all sad and ashamed…!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: S-So that's what's happening… Windy-san….

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
I completely understand, I completely understand!! 
It's clear as day that our Demon Queen is only showing us her kindness…!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Palmer and Helios left, and so did others as time went by, yet 
everyone still gave their all to finish preparing in time, and 
they've brought us this far!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
So she can't get the Demon Queen Army involved anymore. But she 
still won't compromise! That's why she rejected me earlier! She 
wants to carry the rest of this burden by herself…!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
But to think…! Although… although my fav already 
said "Let me do it myself", this lowly Digitan 
must still express her disapproval…!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
…U-Uhm, Digital-san. "fav" means something like someone you 
admire… did I get that right?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Eh? Aaah uh, y-yes that's it!! It can mean or imply many 
other things, but that's pretty much the idea!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Is that so…. ….Uh, Uhm….

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
…Excuse me, Digital. I-I want to suggest 
something crazy right now….

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
T-That person you admire, should we… try to stop this person from 
trying to do everything themselves…?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: …Eh?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I… also have someone whom I admire. She's stronger than anyone 
else, always looking forward, always shining brightly… and I'm 
sure… she's fine with being alone as well.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I admire her, so understand how amazing, wonderful, and 
magnificent she is, and I never think otherwise, but… but–

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: But even then… I never think that I should leave her alone.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: I always think… that I should be friends with that person.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Friends…. 
…!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Honestly, Digital, I'm so glad we were able to become friends, 
I've been having so much fun!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Aa—…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
(A one sided relationship is fine. That is just how it is between 
an otaku and her fav. But… I suddenly thought that maybe, a one 
sided relationship isn't that good.)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (However, with how I am now–)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
(From the small hole in the invisible filter from which I observe 
the world, a new breeze blew in. The wind was so weak, yet so 
strong at the same time.)
